importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The incident occurred on Tuesday, October 21, 2025, and is the primary timeline reference for the event described.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The incident took place early Tuesday morning, with updates and confirmation provided by 2:32 PM EDT, indicating a timeline of immediate response and reporting.

keyTakeAways: A suspect was gravely wounded during an immigration enforcement operation in Los Angeles.
A deputy U.S. marshal was injured during the same incident.
Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agents attempted to make contact with the suspect as part of an immigration removal effort.
The suspect reportedly rammed into a vehicle used by ICE and U.S. marshals during the operation.
Gunfire erupted after an ICE officer smashed a window with a service weapon while confronting the suspect's vehicle.
It is believed the agent's weapon discharged while attempting to grab the suspect, striking both the suspect and a deputy U.S. marshal.
The U.S. Marshals Service confirmed a deputy was injured and is being evaluated in the hospital.
The specific condition of the gravely wounded suspect is not currently known.
The incident occurred during a joint immigration enforcement operation between ICE and U.S. Marshals.

summaryOfNewsArticle: During a joint immigration enforcement operation in Los Angeles on Tuesday, October 21, 2025, a suspect allegedly rammed into a vehicle used by Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) and U.S. Marshals agents. After an ICE officer smashed the suspect’s vehicle window with a service weapon, gunfire reportedly erupted when the agent’s weapon discharged while attempting to seize the suspect. The suspect was gravely wounded, though their condition is not yet known, and a deputy U.S. marshal was injured and is being evaluated in the hospital. Authorities believe the incident stemmed from a failed attempt to make contact during an immigration removal effort. The U.S. Marshals Service confirmed the injury, and CNN has reached out to the Los Angeles Police Department for additional details.
title: Suspect 'Gravely Wounded' and US Marshal Injured in Los Angeles Immigration Enforcement Incident
